x_nuvo_diag_probes.description:
When we add "area_unit" in the nuvolo property - x_nuvo_eam_np_fm_space_desktop_hover_attributes. It is not showing up in the Hover on Wokspace Manager
Steps to reproduce :
1.Go to the Nuvolo Property - x_nuvo_eam_np_fm_space_desktop_hover_attributes 2.Add 'area_unit' in the property 3.Check the hover on Workspace Manager
x_nuvo_diag_probes.name: area_unit is not showing in the hover
x_nuvo_diag_probes.remediation: Area unit is coming when the property has value "reference_area_unit"
x_nuvo_diag_probes.sys_name: area_unit is not showing in the hover

sys_update_version.name: x_nuvo_diag_probes_1be86277db4dd5505f598b05059619a1
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="x_nuvo_diag_probes"><x_nuvo_diag_probes action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><description>When we add  "area_unit" in the nuvolo property - x_nuvo_eam_np_fm_space_desktop_hover_attributes. It is not showing up in the Hover on Wokspace Manager

Steps to reproduce :

1.Go to the Nuvolo Property - x_nuvo_eam_np_fm_space_desktop_hover_attributes
2.Add 'area_unit' in the property
3.Check the hover on Workspace Manager</description><healthcheck_type/><name>area_unit is not showing in the hover </name><order>100</order><probe_type/><product_version/><remediation>Area unit is coming when the property has value "reference_area_unit"</remediation><script><![CDATA[var util = new x_nuvo_diag.DiagnosticUtil();

var propValues = [];

var checkPropertyValue = new GlideRecord("x_nuvo_mobile_nuvolo_property");
checkPropertyValue.addEncodedQuery("name=x_nuvo_eam_np_fm_space_desktop_hover_attributes^active=true^valueLIKEreference_area_unit");
checkPropertyValue.query();
var flag = 0;
if (checkPropertyValue.getRowCount > 1) {
    flag = 1;
        
}

    if (flag == 1) {
        // reference_area_unit present in x_nuvo_eam_np_fm_space_desktop_hover_attributes property
    } else {
        util.handleOutput("If area_unit is not showing up in the Hover on Wokspace Manager than Please add the value 'reference_area_unit' to nuvolo property x_nuvo_eam_np_fm_space_desktop_hover_attributes", 'information', 'Space');
    }

]]></script><sys_class_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>Harshal.Sonawane@nuvolo.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-08-08 12:53:50</sys_created_on><sys_id>1be86277db4dd5505f598b05059619a1</sys_id><sys_mod_count>14</sys_mod_count><sys_name>area_unit is not showing in the hover </sys_name><sys_package display_value="Diagnostic Tool" source="x_nuvo_diag">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Diagnostic Tool">3acdaefd1be7fc107798a9b7624bcb74</sys_scope><sys_update_name>x_nuvo_diag_probes_1be86277db4dd5505f598b05059619a1</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>Stefan.Popov@nuvolo.com</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2024-09-17 11:21:27</sys_updated_on><tool>diagnostic</tool></x_nuvo_diag_probes></record_update>
